data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of La Paz, Honduras.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of La Paz, Honduras
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of La Paz.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in La Paz, Honduras to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
Spirit, encourage every believer in La Paz, Honduras to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Turk people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Turk people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Turk people is yours.
Jesus, please help the 61,711 believers in the state of La Paz to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Lord, we pray for the believers in La Paz, Honduras to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in La Paz, Honduras.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

location.name: La Paz
location.cities_list: La Paz, Marcala, Santiago de Puringla, Cane, San Pedro de Tutule
location.cities_list_w_pop: La Paz (17,555), Marcala (10,054), Santiago de Puringla (2,433), Cane (2,190), San Pedro de Tutule (1,876)
